article_title: Here's how to get emergency dental care in Nova Scotia during COVID-19
article_description: Nova Scotians needing emergency dental work are being steered toward six emergency dental clinics in Halifax and Sydney  but the province s dentistry board plans to open more locations soon
article_content: Nova Scotians needing emergency dental work are being steered toward six emergency dental clinics in Halifax and Sydney  but the province s dentistry board plans to open more locations soon Dr  Martin Gillis  the registrar of the Provincial Dental Board of    2585 chars
